data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Aditya Birla Lifestyle Brands Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from June 23 2025 the equity shares of Aditya Birla Lifestyle Brands Ltd (Scrip Code: 544403) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of T Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250619-8 dated June 19 2025.
